synopsis.text:
Baku Yumemakura and Hisashi Eguchi present a hilarious, four-part anime adaptation of Eguchi's gag manga, originally featured in Studio Pierrot's Anime V Comic Rentaman. This adult comedy anthology showcases the outrageous antics of a crude family, the challenges of married life, and the peculiar struggles of an overweight boxer.

In the first episode, a boorish family embarks on a mission to marry off their daughter, leading to a series of side-splitting events. The second episode shifts focus to an unexpected invasion of colossal monsters, promising laughter amidst chaos.

Returning to the uncouth family in the third episode, viewers will be entertained by the trials and tribulations of newlywed life. Lastly, the fourth episode introduces a determined boxer with an unusual weight-loss regimen: abstinence.

Prepare for a unique and raunchy anime experience that combines humor, absurdity, and a touch of the extraordinary.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
